summary:
Crafting Diagram redesign the Crafting System to rely on diagrams in possession of the player.
Find diagrams on your journey, buy them from blacksmiths and other merchants, or draw them based on items you own.
With them, you can craft weapons, or pay craftsman to do the job for you.
descriptionHtml:
Crafting Diagram is (yet another) Witcher 3 inspired mod, which aim to redesign the vanilla crafting system.


Instead of magically learning how to create weapons, armors, and other items, you need to find the relevant diagram first.


Diagrams can be be foud individually, or packaged in a holder containing one or more of them. They can be found in the various chest, especially boss ones,or bought from blacksmith, generalist merchants, jewelers, or fletchers.


You need diagrams in your possession to craft items. They can either hang loose in your inventory, or be stashed in your very own holder.


You can also give diagrams to craftsman so that they may create the item for you, provided you pay for their services and provide them with required items.



Tempering weapons and armors is left completely independant of the diagrams.
author: Kesta
